firestore.reasoning:
The Firestore data structure is designed to support the HetalShruti Boutique e-commerce application, focusing on products and shopping cart functionality.  Authorization Independence is achieved by not requiring any `get()` calls in security rules.  Since the application logic does not specify a need for user-specific product lists, or collaborative product management, the structure is straightforward.

The `products` collection stores product information, enabling category browsing and detailed product pages. The `users/{userId}/shopping_cart/{cartItemId}` path stores individual shopping cart items for each user. This approach ensures private user data and simplifies list operations, as each user can only access their own cart. The `products` collection can be read by all users (QAP - Rules are not Filters), but write access is restricted.

This design prioritizes simplicity and security while meeting the core feature requirements of the application.
